trans-unit.source: Defines the interface that receives workflow instance creation, execution, and termination status information from a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.DebugController"></xref> object running inside the workflow host application.
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This interface is implemented by a .NET remoting object hosted by the debugger.
Called when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.ExecutionStatus*> of an activity within the workflow changes.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
A <xref:System.Guid> associated with the currently running workflow instance.
A <xref:System.String> containing the fully qualified name of the current activity.
A <xref:System.String> containing the qualified name of the parent activity.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.ExecutionStatus*> of the current activity.
An <xref:System.Int32> containing the activity execution context ID associated with the current activity.
Called when an assembly is loaded in the app domain corresponding to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> in the workflow host application.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
A <xref:System.String> containing the path on disk from where the assembly is loaded
A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the assembly is loaded from the global assembly cache.
Called before the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.ExecutionStatus*> of an activity within the workflow changes.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
A <xref:System.Guid> associated with the currently running workflow instance.
A <xref:System.String> containing the fully qualified name of the current activity.
A <xref:System.String> containing the qualified name of the parent activity.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.ExecutionStatus*> of the current activity.
An <xref:System.Int32> containing the activity execution context ID associated with the current activity.
Called before a handler in the code-beside is about to be invoked.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
A <xref:System.String> containing the fully qualified name of the current activity.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.ActivityHandlerDescriptor"></xref> that contains the information regarding the code-beside handler method that is about to be invoked.
Called after a handler in the code-beside is invoked.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
A <xref:System.Guid> associated with the currently running workflow instance.
An <xref:System.Int32> containing the ID of the thread on which the handler was invoked.
A <xref:System.String> containing the fully qualified name of the current activity.
Called when a workflow instance completes.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
A <xref:System.Guid> associated with the currently running workflow instance.
Called when a workflow instance is created.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
A <xref:System.Guid> associated with the currently running workflow instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
Called when the workflow instance is dynamically updated with a workflow change.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
A <xref:System.Guid> associated with the currently running workflow instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
Called when a new workflow type is loaded by the workflow runtime engine in the workflow host application.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
A <xref:System.String> containing the assembly name from which the workflow type was loaded.

A <xref:System.String> containing the full path of the markup file corresponding to the workflow, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the workflow type was a code-only workflow.
A <xref:System.String> containing the md5 hash code for the workflow markup definition, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the workflow type was a code-only workflow.
A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the workflow definition was modified dynamically.
A <xref:System.String> containing the fully qualified name of the workflow type.
A <xref:System.String> containing the workflow type name.
A <xref:System.String> containing the XAML serialized format of the workflow type.
Called to set the initial status of the activities in a workflow.
This method is called when a workflow instance is loaded from a persistence store or when the debugger is attached to a workflow host that has workflow instance already running.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
A <xref:System.Guid> associated with the currently running workflow instance.
A <xref:System.String> containing the fully qualified name of the current activity.
A <xref:System.String> containing the qualified name of the parent activity.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.ExecutionStatus*> of the current activity.
An <xref:System.Int32> containing the activity execution context ID associated with the current activity.
Called when an activity enters the Executing state.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> instance.
An internally generated <xref:System.Guid> associated with a workflow type.
A <xref:System.String> containing the fully qualified name of the current activity.
A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> of handlers associated with an activity.
